1.content:
Are you Male or Female? https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/fate...
Decide for yourself, anyways: You awake in your Room in Chaldea, shrunken down to the size of around 1 Inch height, you dunno how that happend, but what you know is that you have to get back to normal as fast as possible!
1.title: The Beginning

11.content: You are the Female protagonist of the game, and just as you fully recognize what happened to you and thought about what to do next, you hear foot steps infront of the door.
11.title: Female

111.content: You run and hide under the bedcover when you suddenly hear the door open and a voice asking "Master?" expecting you to sit or lie in your bed or being in your room anywhere at normal size, but who's voice is it?
111.title: Hide under the bedcover

112.content: You stay where you are on the floor , can't fully adapt to what's going around you, suddenly booming sounds oh someone's foot steps, door opens and it's...
112.title: Don't move

choices: You're frozen by the fear and just stay in place
You try to get out of his way
1122.content:
You see a pink haired girl coming on your way, but wist a second that's not a girl that's Astolfo, his long link hair and thin fights deceived you at first sight, considering it was almost like he was hundreds of meters away from your perspective.
"master aren't you there? "
He looks for you as he gets closer to the bad his footsteps shakes the ground even more. At your super tiny size he most likely will crush you if you don't so something.
1122.title: Astolfo

choices: Make your way to Da Vinci's workshop
Go to a specific Servant's room
12.content: At this point you're used to waking up to bizarre things. Singularity or just a servant messing with you, you've seen it all. Or so you thought. Waking up you notice that your surroundings have changed. No, perhaps it is more accurate that you've changed. "Why am I so small!" You yell out in bewilderment. You try to telepathically talk to your demi-servant Mashu, but there is no response. Matter of fact it's as if there's no connection at all. You take a look at your hand and instantly feel even more annoyed than before. Your command seals are missing. This means you can't summon a servant to aid you. Releasing a sigh you say "Getting scared isn't gonna do anything, I've got to find a way to get help." Pausing for a second you add on "and not get hurt or worse by anyone." What should be your first plan of action?
12.title: Male

121.content:
"I'd rather be safe than sorry, I don't want to take a chance at being crushed in the halls. Besides, My room gets a lot of traffic and it's only a matter of time before someone comes in here." You sit down in your bed and wait patiently. That is until a thought enters your mind "Man, I hope they see me when they come in. I ought to head over to my desk where I'm easier to see. Getting up, you head to the edge of your bed. There is gap between the desk and your bed, Looking at it for a moment and doing a couple of test jumps you, decide that you can make it. Giving yourself a running start you make the jump to the desk. You barely make it, rolling when you land. "Maybe it was smarter to just wait on the bed. Oh well at least I made it."


Just then you hear your door opening and see a servant entering your room. "Yes, Over here!" you yell, jumping up and waving your arms around to get the attention of_________
121.title: Wait for a servant

1211.content:
The last thing the alter version of Atalanta expected to see upon checking on her master was for him to super small on his desk. She quickly made her way over to the desk where he was and picked him up. "Master, how did you end up like this?" You respond to her "I don't know. I just woke up and found myself like this. Atalanta do you still feel the connection to me? I don't have any seals and can't communicate telepathically to anyone." Atalanta processed this and replied "That's weird, but I still feel the Master Servant connection." Things are quiet for moment before Atalanta gains a teasing look in her eye and a light smirk. "You know, I always used to say don't get close to me. You remember what I said I'd do?" Atalanta says with that same smirk. "Uh, you said you'd bite me, but you wouldn't do that now would you, right.?" you say with a very nervous giggle "Oh, I wasn't going to, but now that you mention it." Atalanta brings your small form upward and toward her mouth. She tilts her head back and opens her mouth, Her breath washes over you and you peer into her wide maw. Her menacing, pearly white fangs drift closer as she lowers you closer to her mouth and her wet tongue extends as if inviting you. You're too petrified to do anything as your feet just barely reach past her lips. Then she yanks you back and she releases a giggle. "Heh, just kidding Master.I'm not going to do anything bad to you" Your fear quickly vanishes and is replaced with relief.

"God you had me for a moment Nyanta, good one" You nervously laugh. "What did you just call me" Atalanta Alter says with a cold look and serious tone. "Oh shoot, I'm sorry Nyant- AH, I'm sorry I mean Atalanta. I know you hate that name, but can you let me off the hook. You say pleadingly. "Not this time, Master" Atalanta looks at you with a terrifyingly cold stare before she says "I take back what I said. I AM going to do something bad to you, More precisely I'm going to ________."
1211.title: Atalanta Alter

choices: Take a chance and try to get her attention
Stay out if sight and keep moving, hope she doesn't "accidently" crush you.
122.content: You decide to go to the Da Vinci's workshop to get help, at your current sizes this might take hours. You run off to the hallway to reach there, so far no problems until you saw a woman in red clothing, it is Mordred coming on your way.
122.title: Make your way to Da Vinci's workshop

choices: She notices you and takes a closer look
She doesn't notice you and just keeps walking
She does notice you but thinks you're a small bug
1221.content: "Well who knows what else will happen on my way there, better try to get help fork Mo-chan" you think to yourself, here goes nothing. You jump around and scream in hopes of her noticing your presence, but your current size is really hard to notice. After a whole she...
1221.title: Take a chance and try to get her attention

info.brief_description: Shrinking around the Girls of Fate/Grand Order
info.description:
Fate Grand Order is a Mobile game from the Fate/ series. Most of the Girls in this story should be Servants from there, if you barely know them, you can find a list of them in the following link: http://fate-go.cirnopedia.org/servant_all.php#nav

For yourself: You play as the Male or Female protagonist of the game and after one of your servants shrinks unaware by mistake you have to find a way to get back to normal.

But be careful, most of the girls definitly like to play with you x3
